name: Just Hands (DEMO)
description:
Complete the tasks with a serious hand condition where you can only move both hands at once. Early game demo includes 3 levels and 3 bonus levels.

Solve daily puzzles in this relaxing(-ly chaotic) game. And totally, most definitely NOT a game that will make you angry at all.

The demo consists of 3 challenging levels and 3 bonus levels.

Try to beat them as fast as you can!

NOTE : THIS IS STILL THE DEMO VERSION OF THE FULL GAME. MANY MORE FEATURES, MECHANICS, AND GAMEPLAY WILL BE ADDED IN FUTURE VERSIONS OF THE GAME.

Have a spare dollar or two? Why not consider supporting so that you can see the full game in action!
